work.description: Development of research tasks on data stream mining and exploration of new research opportunities within the Andalusian Research Institute in Data Science and Computational Intelligence (DaSCI).
Development of research within the SiMiDat research group.
Development of doctoral thesis in the SiMiDat research group of the Department of Computer Science of the University of Jaén.

Development of research tasks within the research group Intelligent Systems and Data Mining (SIMIDAT) of the University of Jaén related to the development of a research project assigned to the group. Likewise, I carry out maintenance tasks of the different computer equipment that are part of the research group.

Development of the backend for the application "dmServer" consisting of an online application for the application of data mining methods. The development of this backend has been developed in php with a MySQL database with different linux systems administration tasks. Application available at http://simidat-apps.ujaen.es

work.position: Colaboration Scholarship of the Spanish Ministry of Education (Initiation to research)
work.description: Development of a project in collaboration with the research group SIMIDAT of the Department of Computer Science of the University of Jaén consisting of the development of a package of algorithms for the extraction of descriptive rules based on supervised learning (subgroup discovery) for the R programming language.
